title: I was wondering this about Karma, Can Karma R, not consume abilties cooldown?
body:
That should give her much more burst for Mid Lane Karma, just like Leblanc.
She could E,W,RQ,Q.

replies.body:

As someone already stated, the double shield, being able to stun 2 targets at once or basically do triple damage with Q is nuts. Champ would end up  getting re balanced and nerfed. That one ability upgrade would be too big of a buff. She is in a good spot at the moment. I won't downvote your idea, but that seems a bit silly, she is a support not an assassin.
